description: Position of incrementally largest terms in continued fraction for Niven's constant.
references: Niven, I. ``Averages of Exponents in Factoring Integers.'' Proc. Amer. Math. Soc. 22, 356-360, 1969
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Niven's Constant
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: One more term from Michel ten Voorde (seqfan(AT)tenvoorde.org) Jun 14 2003
